title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the MRU (Most Recently Used) list do not appear in the File menu after restarting the application. Currently, the MRU list is not persisted between sessions.
EB: The MRU file list should be persisted between sessions, so that the recently used files continue to appear in the File menu after restarting the application.
SR:
1. Open the application and access multiple files in different sessions.
2. Close the application.
3. Reopen the application.
4. Check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously accessed files are still displayed.
